ability_info.title: Artificial Satellite
ability_info.desc: Protects from all harm and also facilitates distant materialization.

ability_info.title: Electroshock
ability_info.desc: Does shock damage to a nearby foe. Effective versus larger creatures.

ability_info.title: Disintegration
ability_info.desc: Does pure damage to a nearby foe. Bonus based on it's missing health.

ability_info.title: Materialization
ability_info.desc: Summons a creature on the combat field that will serve and obey orders.

ability_info.title: Post Mortem
ability_info.desc: Drops a powerful fuse bomb on the ground when dying.

ability_info.title: Sword Slash
ability_info.desc: Swift attack on a nearby foe.

ability_info.title: Pistol Shot
ability_info.desc: Medium range shot.

ability_info.title: Rifle Shot
ability_info.desc: Very powerful long range attack.

ability_info.title: Backstabber
ability_info.desc: Reduces damage from behind and returns some to melee attackers.

ability_info.title: Metallic Claws
ability_info.desc: Razor sharp claws help him really shred his foes.

ability_info.title: Tail Mace
ability_info.desc: Whips out it's scepter like tail to bluntly punish a distant foe.

ability_info.title: Brain Power
ability_info.desc: Electro-charges it's brain functions to shock all nearby creatures.

ability_info.title: Spore Contamination
ability_info.desc: Nearby foes have their regrowth stat constantly reduced with each round.

ability_info.title: Chomp
ability_info.desc: Takes a huge bite out of his foe, restoring a minor amount of health.

ability_info.title: Blade Kick
ability_info.desc: Slashes nearby foe using feet claws.

ability_info.title: Frogger
ability_info.desc: Leaps in straight line over obstacles, gaining bonus offense after landing.
ability_info.info: +30 offense for next hit if not moving

ability_info.title: Infernal Temper
ability_info.desc: Bursts into flames when it's turn comes, damaging nearby creatures.

ability_info.title: Pulverize
ability_info.desc: Smacks a foe with its heavy hand.

ability_info.title: Fissure
ability_info.desc: Smashes his fists into the ground, wreaking fierce havoc ahead.

ability_info.title: Molten Hurl
ability_info.desc: Turns into a molten boulder, bowling itself into first foe in a straight line.

ability_info.title: Armor Penetration
ability_info.desc: Attacks gradually break through enemy defense.

ability_info.title: Jab Attack
ability_info.desc: Horn attack that does bonus pierce damage based on distance traveled.

ability_info.title: Static Charge
ability_info.desc: Shakes hair to create friction and imbue next attack with lightning.

ability_info.title: Envenom
ability_info.desc: Makes use of tongue to smear the horn with highly venomous saliva.

ability_info.title: Cryosauna
ability_info.desc: Foes have their movement reduced and initiative constantly decreased.

ability_info.title: Frost Bite
ability_info.desc: Pokes ice teeth into nearby foe.

ability_info.title: Nitrogen Splash
ability_info.desc: Exhales freezing gas that does more damage as it travels.

ability_info.title: Glacial Spikes
ability_info.desc: Several spears of ice erupt in the area nearby, impaling all creatures.

ability_info.title: Eye of the Fire
ability_info.desc: Strategically teleports to a new location on the combat field.

ability_info.title: Fiery Claw
ability_info.desc: Scratch and burn a nearby foe.

ability_info.title: Fire Ball
ability_info.desc: Throws a ball of fire that explodes on impact, damaging several creatures.

ability_info.title: Infernal Pyre
ability_info.desc: Increases power of it's back fire in order to burn all adjacent creatures.

ability_info.title: Unstoppable
ability_info.desc: Successfully resists first signs of fatigue, being able to carry on.

ability_info.title: Knuckle Head
ability_info.desc: Smashes ringed head into a foe.

ability_info.title: Meat Hook
ability_info.desc: Drags a foe, doing bonus damage if it doesn't have any movement points.

ability_info.title: Double Swipe
ability_info.desc: Slashes nearby foes with both claws.

ability_info.title: Frozen Tower
ability_info.desc: Temporary increases offense and defense by holding the same spot.

ability_info.title: Icy Talons
ability_info.desc: Scratches nearby foe using claws.

ability_info.title: Tail Uppercut
ability_info.desc: Sucker punches a near enemy using tail, ignoring most of it's defense.

ability_info.title: Icicle Tongue
ability_info.desc: Launches tongue, piercing all foes sitting in front in a straight line.

ability_info.title: Inner Vision
ability_info.desc: Lack of sight forces the creature to focus on it's other senses.

ability_info.title: Tongue Dagger
ability_info.desc: Melee attack on a nearby foe.

ability_info.title: Sonic Scream
ability_info.desc: Shock waves that travel far.

ability_info.title: Psychic Blast
ability_info.desc: Focuses the power of mind in order to attack foes from a small region.

ability_info.title: Travel Waypoint
ability_info.desc: Transfer from a shroom to another.

ability_info.title: Head Bash
ability_info.desc: Bumps it's large cap into nearby foe.

ability_info.title: Tiny Mushroom
ability_info.desc: Drops a shroom that serves as a waypoint or a poisonous trap.

ability_info.title: Noxious Cloud
ability_info.desc: Releases several toxic clouds all around, persisting for several rounds.

ability_info.title: Bunny Hopping
ability_info.desc: Avoids a basic attack by moving to an available adjacent location.

ability_info.title: Big Nip
ability_info.desc: Dents nearby foe using it's big teeth.

ability_info.title: Blowing Wind
ability_info.desc: Pushes an inline creature several hexagons backwards, based on size.

ability_info.title: Chilling Spit
ability_info.desc: Spits inline foe with cold saliva. Bonus damage based on distance.

ability_info.title: Decaying Carcass
ability_info.desc: When dead, it's corpse rots fast and emanates poisonous gases.

ability_info.title: Sink Teeth
ability_info.desc: Bites a nearby foe.

ability_info.title: Bad Breath
ability_info.desc: Stinks up several nearby enemies.

ability_info.title: Toxic Bubble
ability_info.desc: Creates a mucus bubble from it's nose and pushes it away.

ability_info.title: Self Flatten
ability_info.desc: Squishes itself in order to avoid a melee attack or allow an ally to pass.

ability_info.title: Gummy Mallet
ability_info.desc: Transforms itself into a rubber hammer to strike a nearby foe.

ability_info.title: Royal Seal
ability_info.desc: Sticks chewing gum in place to hinder enemy movement.

ability_info.title: Boom Box
ability_info.desc: Turns belly into a speaker, blasting an inline foe, pushing it back a bit.

ability_info.title: Fried Chicken
ability_info.desc: Corpse can be consumed by other creatures, regaining some health.

ability_info.title: Face Smash
ability_info.desc: Bashes nearby foe using it's head.

ability_info.title: Optic Blast
ability_info.desc: Zaps a foe with it's laser cannon.

ability_info.title: Magic Act
ability_info.desc: Swaps places of any two creatures in front that have similar sizes overall.

ability_info.title: Ground Shaker
ability_info.desc: Stomps the ground when walking, increasing the delay of all it's foes.

ability_info.title: Lava Splash
ability_info.desc: Hits a near foe with a handful of lava.

ability_info.title: Volcanic Cannon
ability_info.desc: Fires a flaming boulder projectile at a target foe.

ability_info.title: Spitfire
ability_info.desc: Erupts with rage, bombarding the battlefield with burning lava.

ability_info.title: Spiked Fence
ability_info.desc: When dead, enemies walking on it's corpse get their limbs impaled.

ability_info.title: Trident Forehead
ability_info.desc: Pokes nearby enemy with it's large forehead spikes.

ability_info.title: Trap Jaw
ability_info.desc: Bites nearby foe, crippling it.

ability_info.title: Circular Saw
ability_info.desc: Travels in a straight line and back, cutting through encountered foes.

ability_info.title: Pulse of the Maggots
ability_info.desc: Gains one regrowth point for each corpse located on the battlefield.

ability_info.title: Claw Strike
ability_info.desc: Slashes nearby foe using claws.

ability_info.title: Fly Swarm
ability_info.desc: Damages and distracts a foe, lowering it's offense and defense.

ability_info.title: Shadow Army
ability_info.desc: Allows any dead creature to fight again for it's life, as a shadow being.

ability_info.title: Blood Chalice
ability_info.desc: Nearby damage restores own health.

ability_info.title: Slice
ability_info.desc: Claw swipe gesture on a nearby foe.

ability_info.title: Fatal Attraction
ability_info.desc: Causes a target foe to come close to her, while depleting its movement.

ability_info.title: Tentacle Feet
ability_info.desc: All nearby foes have their movement restrained and take some damage.

ability_info.title: Cryosauna
ability_info.desc: Foes have their movement reduced and initiative constantly decreased.

ability_info.title: Suction cups
ability_info.desc: Crushes a frontal foe while draining a very small amount of it's energy.

ability_info.title: Tentacle Grasp
ability_info.desc: Pulls a rather distant inline foe nearby while also crushing it.

ability_info.title: Frostbite Shower
ability_info.desc: Sprinkles the area in front with liquid nitrogen, doing cold damage.

ability_info.title: Half Life
ability_info.desc: Can regenerate health up to double.

ability_info.title: Bone Scythe
ability_info.desc: Slashes nearby foe, causing it to bleed and lose health if moving.

ability_info.title: Blood Puke
ability_info.desc: Target's regrowth becomes nulled if it's a foe or doubles if it's an ally.

ability_info.title: Symbiotic Tumor
ability_info.desc: Engulfs body into a meat cocoon for bonus protection and regrowth.

ability_info.title: Lava Pool
ability_info.desc: When dead, melts into puddle of boiling lava that damages foes.

ability_info.title: Poked Eye
ability_info.desc: Swings it's eye at a nearby foe.

ability_info.title: Iron Shell
ability_info.desc: Solidifies from magma state into iron, greatly increasing resistances.

ability_info.title: Black Pearl
ability_info.desc: Fires a durable sphere up in to the air, falling on target the next round.

ability_info.title: Forced Involution
ability_info.desc: When dead, reconfigures itself as a weaker creature, the Magma Spawn.

ability_info.title: Forked Hand
ability_info.desc: Pierces foe using it's metallic harpoon shaped fingers.

ability_info.title: Fire Dump
ability_info.desc: Ignites the ground, the fire expands and contracts over several rounds.

ability_info.title: Shotgun Blast
ability_info.desc: Blows a handful of shrapnel in a conic area, doing versatile damage.

ability_info.title: Healing Factor
ability_info.desc: Able to regenerate even if fatigued.

ability_info.title: Gauntlet Strike
ability_info.desc: Punches a nearby foe with it's heavy armored hand, leaving quite a mark.

ability_info.title: Bloody Greed
ability_info.desc: Powerful sword penetrating attack, affecting multiple inline hexagons.

ability_info.title: Supreme Motivation
ability_info.desc: Greed drives it to do an extra effort and act twice in the current round.
ability_info.info: Ability only usable once per round.

ability_info.title: Self Sewing
ability_info.desc: Partially repairs itself if not taking any damage for a whole round.

ability_info.title: Free Haircut
ability_info.desc: Takes out it's pair of scissors and cuts a nearby foe, keeping a sample.

ability_info.title: Scarecrow
ability_info.desc: Intimidates target foe, making it run away at the beginning of it's turn.

ability_info.title: Voodoo Doll
ability_info.desc: Stabs itself, doing mental damage to any of the previously attacked foes.

ability_info.title: Immortal Tree
ability_info.desc: Creature is being resurrected each time another one dies right on top.

ability_info.title: Stalagmite Teeth
ability_info.desc: Pierces nearby foe with it's denture.

ability_info.title: Waterfall Burst
ability_info.desc: Powerful jet of water (Waterfall Cannon?)

ability_info.title: Weed Field
ability_info.desc: Nasty weeds spring allover a region, growing with time.

ability_info.title: Tankish Build
ability_info.desc: 20% bonus to masteries and defense.

ability_info.title: Stomp'A'Fool
ability_info.desc: Deals damage to nearby foe.

ability_info.title: Stone Grinder
ability_info.desc: Destroys fatigued one or two hexagon creature or corpse.

ability_info.title: Charcoal Blast
ability_info.desc: Bombards an area with burning coal.
ability_info.info: 10 crush to target + 10 burn in area

ability_info.title: Bad Touch
ability_info.desc: Every three strikes, a melee attacker is turned to gold for several rounds.

ability_info.title: Red Crystal
ability_info.desc: Pokes nearby foe using staff.

ability_info.title: Winged Orb
ability_info.desc: Heals an ally or damages a foe that's at the target location next round.

ability_info.title: Burning Light
ability_info.desc: Conjures an energy beam that causes multiple burns in a straight line.

ability_info.title: Offspring
ability_info.desc: Spawns a little hungry eggplant that chases nearest foe and attacks it.

ability_info.title: Dinner Time
ability_info.desc: Bites a nearby foe.

ability_info.title: Pony Tail
ability_info.desc: Whips and poisons nearby foes, knocking them back.

ability_info.title: Snake Tongue
ability_info.desc: Throws tongue at a distant target, having it come back with time.

ability_info.title: Retaliation
ability_info.desc: Returns favor to frontal attackers, by slashing them with it's heavy claws.

ability_info.title: Pummel
ability_info.desc: Severly punches a nearby foe.

ability_info.title: Frightening Howl
ability_info.desc: Removes positive buffs and reduces offense and defense of nearby foes.

ability_info.title: Slice and Dice
ability_info.desc: Brutally slashes all frontal foes using it's extremely sharp claws.

ability_info.title: Percussion Spear
ability_info.desc: Attacks cause rear spear strike, which cannot be dodged.

ability_info.title: Executioner Axe
ability_info.desc: Slashes nearby foe, doing bonus damage based on it's max health.

ability_info.title: Dragon Flight
ability_info.desc: Travels to a location passing over obstacles with no movement cost.

ability_info.title: Breath of Life
ability_info.desc: Brings back to life a dead ally, with health equal to the endurance stat.

ability_info.title: Intimidating
ability_info.desc: Nearby foes have their offense and defense reduced for a round.

ability_info.title: Wrist Blade
ability_info.desc: Slashes nearby foe using blade.

ability_info.title: Knock Back
ability_info.desc: Attack that pushes back target.

ability_info.title: Overpower
ability_info.desc: Increases offense and defense until attacking or getting hit once.

ability_info.title: Shield Block
ability_info.desc: Uses shield to defend against frontal attacks, greatly reducing damage.

ability_info.title: Perstilence
ability_info.desc: Foes have regrowth and meditation constantly reduced every few rounds.

ability_info.title: Gnarled Staff
ability_info.desc: Pokes nearby foe using wooden staff.

ability_info.title: Rock Shard
ability_info.desc: Summons obstacle at inline location, doing some damage when erupting.

ability_info.title: Furious Twister
ability_info.desc: Summons tornado that travels inline every round, bashing all creatures.

ability_info.title: Spa Mud
ability_info.desc: Gains temporary bonus regrowth and defense when entering a mud bath.

ability_info.title: Power Bat
ability_info.desc: Pokes baseball bat into nearby foe.

ability_info.title: Ground Ball
ability_info.desc: Strikes a mud boulder towards a foe.

ability_info.title: Mud Bath
ability_info.desc: Orders a pile of mud at a location, slowing foes passing through.

ability_info.desc: Strikes nearby foe doing bonus damage on unused movement points.

ability_info.desc: Grasps a distant foe, pulling itself to it, doing damage based on distance.

ability_info.desc: Does sonic damage to an inline foe, also causing it to skip next turn.

ability_info.desc: Catapults itself at a foe, reaching it and striking it the next round.

ability_info.desc: Passes through obstacles and takes half the damage.

ability_info.title: Hand Jaw
ability_info.desc: Bites nearby foe using it's ... hand.

ability_info.title: Opression
ability_info.desc: Causes nearby foe to fall into depression and not act for a turn.

ability_info.title: Life and Death
